description: The Temperate and the Intemperate: Miniature from Valerius Maximus, Faits et dits mémorables des romains, translation by Simon de Hesdin and Nicolas de Gonesse of Facta et dicta memorabilia; Master of the Dresden Prayer Book (Flemish, active about 1480 - 1515), Valerius Maximus, Simon de Hesdin (French, died 1383), et al; Bruges, Belgium; 1475 to 1480; Tempera colors and ink on parchment; Leaf: 17.5 × 19.4 cm (6 7/8 × 7 5/8 in.); Ms. 43; J.
